import axios from "axios" import {useState} from "react" function MyBookForm(){ const [Form,setForm]=useState({ name:"", ingredents:"", prep:"", cook:"" }) const handleChange=(e)=>{ const {name,value}=e.target; this.setForm({[name]:value}) } const handleClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault() axios .post("http://localhost:5000/api",Form) .then((res)=>console.log(res)) .catch((err)=> console.log(err)) }; return(








) } export default MyBookForm
